title: 03/30/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/30/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's College Basketball games from both the women's and men's sides. Andy Katz, a man of many jobs around college basketball joined Dan to preview tonight's matchups and well as discuss the teams already in the Final Four. Which team has the best shot to pull off a surprise tonight. As Justin Fields prepares for his pro day today, former NFL executive Louis Riddick joined us from Columbus to discuss some of the noise surrounding Fields. Lastly, after trashing talking DP about his March Madness bracket, Actor Bryan Cranston called in to address the current state of his bracket.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
